1.1.0: Added support for more SSL options.
1.2.1: NewMessage: added support for consumer options (https://kafka.js.org/docs/consuming#a-name-options-a-options).
1.2.2: Added consumer run option `partitionsConsumedConcurrently` configurable in the Backoffice. Default is 3.
Added support for Snappy compression via kafkajs-snappy.
